QueryResult.text: select P.ID, M.PARTITION_CODE, P.MODEL_CODE, D.ID, U.ID, P.IS_ACTIVE, P.DEPTH from CMN_PARTITION_MEMBERS M, CMN_PARTITIONS P, CMN_PARTITION_MODELS D, CMN_SEC_USERS U where M.PRINCIPAL_TYPE = 'USER' and M.PRINCIPAL_ID = U.ID and M.PARTITION_CODE = P.CODE and D.CODE = P.MODEL_CODE union select P.ID, M.PARTITION_CODE, P.MODEL_CODE, D.ID, G.USER_ID, P.IS_ACTIVE, P.DEPTH from CMN_PARTITION_MEMBERS M, CMN_PARTITIONS P, CMN_PARTITION_MODELS D, CMN_SEC_USER_GROUPS G where M.PRINCIPAL_TYPE = 'GROUP' and M.PRINCIPAL_ID = G.GROUP_ID and M.PARTITION_CODE = P.CODE and D.CODE = P.MODEL_CODE union select P.ID, M.PARTITION_CODE, P.MODEL_CODE, D.ID, O.USER_ID, P.IS_ACTIVE, P.DEPTH from CMN_PARTITION_MEMBERS M, CMN_PARTITIONS P, CMN_PARTITION_MODELS D, OBS_UNIT_USERS_V O where M.PRINCIPAL_TYPE = 'OBS' and M.PRINCIPAL_ID = O.UNIT_ID and M.PRINCIPAL_ASSOC_MODE = O.UNIT_MODE and M.PARTITION_CODE = P.CODE and D.CODE = P.MODEL_CODE
